sentences.en: And they told me their insurance wouldn't cover me unless I wore preventative covering.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉我我的保险不能赔偿我因为我们有穿适当的衣服.

sentences.en: Be responsible for facility and utility routine maintenance, preventative maintenance, trouble shooting.
sentences.cn: 负责设施和共用系统的日常维护 、 日常维护 以及 故障排除.

sentences.en: But preventative maintenance is the better alternative!
sentences.cn: 但是,预防性维护,是更好的选择!

sentences.en: Check and empty residual rust - preventative oil inside the gear reducer.
sentences.cn: 检查并排放干净减速机内部的残留润滑 防锈 油.

sentences.en: Corrective and preventative actions are followed up and implemented.
sentences.cn: 纠正预防措施得到跟进和实施.

sentences.en: Distribute individual process equipment and utilities preventative maintenance working order.
sentences.cn: 分发单独设备的工艺设备与设施的预防维护工作单.

sentences.en: Identify the hazards and list preventative measures to control them.
sentences.cn: 识别危险病列出控制这些危险的预防性措施.

sentences.en: Individual process equipment and utilities preventative maintenance working order archive.
sentences.cn: 单独工艺设备与设施的预防维护工作单的存档.

sentences.en: Is the maintenance by a systematic preventative maintenance system?
sentences.cn: 保养维护是否有系统的预防性维护机制?

sentences.en: It's seen as a preventative measure.
sentences.cn: 这被视为一种预防性措施.

sentences.en: Nations across the globe have already been taking preventative measures.
sentences.cn: 全球各国已经采取防范措施.

sentences.en: Perform preventative maintenance and calibration of equipment and systems.
sentences.cn: 执行预防性维护和校准设备和系统.

sentences.en: Since then, several studies have evaluated botulinum toxin as a migraine preventative.
sentences.cn: 在这之后, 数项研究都评定肉毒杆菌毒素是一种偏头痛预防药物.

sentences.en: They are used as a routine preventative treatmet of venous stasis.
sentences.cn: 使用这种袜子已成为预防静脉郁滞的常规措施.

sentences.en: Track process equipment and utilities preventative maintenance progress.
sentences.cn: 工艺设备与设施的预防维护进程的追溯.
